member.name: TASKDIALOG_BUTTON
member.summary: The TASKDIALOG_BUTTON structure contains information used to display a button in a task dialog. The structure uses this structure.

member.name: TASKDIALOG_BUTTON.nButtonID
member.summary: Indicates the value to be returned when this button is selected.

member.name: TASKDIALOG_BUTTON.pszButtonText
member.summary: Pointer that references the string to be used to label the button. This parameter can be either a null-terminated string or an integer resource identifier passed to the macro. When using Command Links, you delineate the command from the note by placing a new line character in the string.
